value:
$WmMEID_グルヴェイグ,ch00_47_Gullveig_F_Normal,Face|All those born of the past will know
death in the future.$k$pI, however, was not born—and neither
will I ever meet my end.$k$pMy life is a cycle unending, eternal.$k$pThe golden serpent springs ever
forth from its own swallowing mouth.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ドロシー,ch02_41_Dorothy_F_Normal,Face|I can't find Father Saul anywhere...
Oh no, what is he up to this time?$k$p$Sbs150|
